title: Behaviorist Programming Language Learning: Mobile Microlearning-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Modular Learning Design Based on Real Business Scenarios to Improve Workplace Applicability for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete programmed language modules with over 80% accuracy and utilize immediate feedback at each stage.
Learners master 200 core job-related vocabulary items within four weeks through daily 15-minute microlearning based on behaviorist reinforcement principles.
Learners decompose complex language structures step-by-step using a gradual approach and perform practical document writing and negotiation role-plays within six months.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
